original_text: For the Lord your God moves among you in your camp. He keeps you safe from your enemies so that you win against them. So make sure that your camp is a holy place. The Lord must not see anything that would bring shame on you. Do not make him turn away from you.
korean_text: 이는 네 하나님 여호와께서 너를 구원하시고 적군을 네게 넘기시려고 네 진영 중에 행하심이라 그러므로 네 진영을 거룩히 하라 그리하면 네게서 불결한 것을 보시지 않으므로 너를 떠나지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: For the Lord your God moves among you in your camp.
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주 너희 하나님께서 너희 진영 중에서 너희와 함께 행하심이라.

sentences.original_text: He keeps you safe from your enemies
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희를 너희 원수의 손에서 구원하시리라.

sentences.original_text: so that you win against them.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 너희가 그들에게서 승리하게 하려 하심이라.

sentences.original_text: So make sure that your camp is a holy place.
The Lord must not see anything that would bring shame on you.
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 너희에게서 부끄러운 것을 보지 않게 하라.

sentences.original_text: Do not make him turn away from you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 너희에게서 얼굴을 돌리지 않게 하라.
